bike.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted, semi-integrated tapered headset w/ 1.5" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube, 68mm BB shell, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted w/ sealed bearing pivots, low-leverage suspended rockers, FSR 140mm travel, cold-forged dropout, CNC'd disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Rockshox Sektor solo air w/ 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, lockout, 140mm travel
Shimano SLX, M675 SGS Shadow Plus top normal, 10-speed
Formula DC71 15mm thru / DC30 32H 6-bolt disc 32H hubs, Sun Inferno 25 rims
Oval M200, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 680mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M200 w/ satin steel rails
Oval M200, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
